name: cornwallgeeks.github.io
description: Cornwall Geeks is an online & offline community of people that talk about geeky stuff. Programming, design, and gaming are a few examples but there are [many more](https://cornwallgeeks.net/slack).

scripts.update-contrib: weallcontribute -o . && git add CONTRIBUTING.md && git commit -m 'docs(contributing): updated CONTRIBUTING.md'

author: Dan Reeves <hey@danreev.es>
